body: This honestly needs to be a series of it's own. Shit's good.
I only go to ehentai when I feel like crusading against the furries.
@Kapab I like your way of thinking. But as I said, Anon will have to endure another update regardless, so plenty of chance for another sweet, sweet round of tard rage.
You know, you should update this translation a few more times just to fuck with the users of this site, I'd actually love to see it
Sir, maybe if you did your job right the first time, the webcrawler wouldn’t need to repost it every time—ah-hyuck, ah-hyuck, ah-hyuck! Lmaorotfl!!1!lol!!!

@KennyCumBuckets 

And to be even fairer, you're on a webcrawler that just reposts shit from Exhentai (and has the audacity to put ads on their site, you really can't make that shit up dude, that's the internet equivalent of the human centipede). That's why you'll get every single update, since the developers of this site didn't even bother to implement a routine that checks for the date of the upload. So go giving their lazy,  leeching asses shit instead. 
 
Or even better: Stop using parasitic webcrawlers and use the source. Go straight to Ehentai. Because everything you see here is from there. 
Then you'll only see the most recent gallery. Simple as that. 

Everything else is just whining of entitled little shits, pardon my french. If you guys insist on getting your cummies on a crawler website, you better live with it. But since Mom always told me to be nice to retards (shoutouts to Ramsay Snow), I now gave you the solution to your troubles.

@Kaf_ka
To be fair, this is like the fourth translated upload this week.

While I'm at it, how about being grateful I even go through the hassle of delivering you ungrateful fucks the character comments? I could've just read it for myself. Just for your information, Japanese handwriting is horrible to translate. 

Sorry for everyone that doesn't whine about "muh repost on a crawler site". It's just about as smart as whining about a search engine turning up different cached versions of the same site.

Translator and editor here. Your own fault if you're using crawler sites instead of the real thing, that is ehentai lul
Look forward to another update with the author's comment.
@Sassaki_Eimi They fixed some TL errors, translated page 6, and put together the double-page parts. That's about it, I guess. Good stuff anyway
How many times will be this get reposted
godly see u in the popular section
